snippet: Ashton B. Carter’s speech came as the Obama administration was trying to convince an apprehensive public that its strategy to destroy the Islamic State would be effective.
abstract: Defense Sec Ashton B Carter gives positive appraisal of Obama administration's attempts to defeat Islamic State; cites new missions by Special Operations forces.
lead_paragraph: Ashton B. Carter’s speech came as the Obama administration was trying to convince an apprehensive public that its strategy to destroy the Islamic State would be effective.

headline.main: Defense Secretary, in Speech to Deploying Troops, Lauds Push Against ISIS
headline.print_headline: Secretary of Defense Lauds Push Against ISIS
